intro: Apatophyllum olsenii, commonly known as the red sandras, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking red, tubular flowers that bloom in summer. The plant typically grows in rocky, well-drained soils and thrives in full sun. It has narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, inconspicuous leaves along its stems. Apatophyllum olsenii is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in suitable climates.
